posts.post_title: T213-2 Barger, Pittsburgh Fed SOLD Thank you!
posts.post_content:
Hi, I was able to purchase an upgrade for my set, so I would like to sell this card.  I paid $15 for it, so I would like to get $15, plus $2 shipping.

Payment by PayPal, check, money order, or Google Pay

Thanks, Rick
